documentation.text:
@dev Deposit ETH into escrow by passenger.
 Records deposit timestamp.
@dev Passenger approves release of funds to driver before timeout.
@dev Driver refunds passenger before refund timeout.
@dev Driver can auto-release funds after releaseTimeout.
@dev Passenger can auto-refund funds after refundTimeout.

approveRelease().details: Passenger approves release of funds to driver before timeout.

autoRefund().details: Passenger can auto-refund funds after refundTimeout.

autoRelease().details: Driver can auto-release funds after releaseTimeout.

constructor.details: Constructor sets the driver and initializes timeouts.

params._refundTimeout: Timeout in seconds after which passenger can auto-refund.
params._releaseTimeout: Timeout in seconds after which driver can auto-claim.

deposit().details: Deposit ETH into escrow by passenger. Records deposit timestamp.

refund().details: Driver refunds passenger before refund timeout.
